posts.content:
Just to let you all know that we are still open for business here at Victoria Farm despite the weather conditions. The ground will dry out during the day & it's all fine.

See you all soon.

John
Thank you for the information. If I have windows in the van we will be heading up tonight, but due to work etc will probably get there around midnight!!

[quote="John"]Just to let you all know that we are still open for business here at Victoria Farm despite the weather conditions. The ground will dry out during the day & it's all fine.

See you all soon.

John[/quote]

not if it continues to rain it won't

We have decided to stay at home in the warm seeing as Standford Hall has been postponed and the FA Cup is on

Wish you the best over the weekend as this will be the first year we havent been in over 6 years

Sorry to hear about the weekend, at Shanford

Paul
